conclusion: Analyze the flow of liquid through baffles to determine which container it will flow into.
Arrows labeled A, B, C, and D indicate the direction of flow through the baffles.
Determine the container that the liquid will flow into after passing through the baffles.
Since the arrows point to different containers, the liquid will flow into the container labeled with the arrow pointing towards it.
The liquid will flow into container F after passing through the baffles.
